ValidationRule.description: Not allowing technicians to update on status complete and incomplete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( $UserRole.Name ='Technician - Contractor' || $UserRole.Name ='Technician - Employees'|| $UserRole.Name = 'Technicians - Employees + Orders'||$UserRole.Name ='Technicians - with Dispatcher Area Manager (Read Only)')&&
NOT(ISCHANGED(Status))&&NOT(ISCHANGED(Field_Incomplete_Time_Stamp__c))&&NOT(ISCHANGED(Field_Complete_Time_Stamp__c))&&NOT(ISCHANGED(Field_Incomplete_by__c))&&NOT(ISCHANGED(Field_Complete_by__c ))&& NOT(ISCHANGED(Updated_Through_Mobile__c))&& NOT(ISCHANGED(Assigned_Technician__c))&& (ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Incompleted') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Completed'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: It's not possible to make any changes on status Complete/Incompleted
